attributes.action: ensure that Jacqui Smith is not elevated to the peerage if she stands down at the election or loses her seat.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition has been created as it would be unacceptable to the British public for Jacqui Smith to be given a peerage at any time, following the verdict of the official Commons inquiry that she incorrectly claimed £116,000.00 for expenses at her family home in Redditch having broken the rules by claiming that a room in her sister's house in London was her principal residence.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
